notice.en: For first-year PhD student/ Biomedicine，combine couse:LS6006
notice.ch: 限生科系博士班一年級，生物醫學組課程，與LS6006合班上課

remark.ch: 限生科系博士班一年級，生物醫學組課程，與LS6006合班上課
remark.en: For first-year PhD student/ Biomedicine，combine couse:LS6006

goal.ch: 專題討論課程旨在培養學生自主學習的能力。這門課著重培養學生以下的能力：（１）同學能探索自己的興趣，進而決定主題，蒐集資料，培養閱讀科學報告的能力（２）資料整合和口頭表達的能力（３）投影片的製作（４）學習研究如何著手和執行
goal.en: This course aims to focus on the ability of students following: (1) students to explore their interests and then decide on the theme, gather information, and develop the ability to read scientific reports (2) data integration and oral expression ability (3) slides produced (4) learning how to proceed and execute.“

outline.ch: 每週由二到三位同學上台進行口頭報告２０～２５分鐘，而後與同學進行提問與回答，對報告者的議題進行充份的討論，討論時間１０～１０分鐘。本學期每位同學需進行兩次上台報告，課堂上無法回答的問題，課後找尋相關資料以書面或口頭的方式回覆。
outline.en: “Week by two or three students came to power 20 to 25 minutes of the oral report, and then with the students to ask questions and answer those topics to report full discussion about the time 10 to 10 minutes. This semester, each student needs twice reports on classroom unanswerable questions and reply after school to find relevant information in writing or verbally.“

instructMethod.ch:
講授

實習/實驗
個別指導

gradMethod.ch:
1.口頭報告70％ (包含paper與PPT slide部分)
2.課堂參與30％
gradMethod.en:
1. Oral presentation 70％ (Including paper and PPT slide 10％)
2. Participation 30％
